revised_title: Alexander Logie Du Toit: A Pioneering Geologist and Earth Scientist
tldr: Alexander Logie Du Toit was a prominent South African geologist and earth scientist who made significant contributions to the understanding of Earth's geological history and processes. He conducted extensive fieldwork, mapped various geological formations, and studied underground water resources. Du Toit also supported the theory of continental drift, which proposed that the Earth's continents were once part of a larger landmass that broke apart and drifted to their current positions.
